analysis.overall_feedback: Strong performance with dominant possession but defensive vulnerabilities exposed in transition. Creative attacking play compensated for defensive lapses. Need to improve defensive organization and set-piece defending.

best_placements: Frenkie de Jong in deep midfield
analysis.overall_feedback: Tactical battle with moments of quality. Defensive solidity was key, but attacking creativity was limited. Physical approach from opponents caused problems. Need more variety in attacking play.
Comfortable victory with controlled performance. Midfield dominance was key to success. Clinical finishing made the difference. Need to maintain consistency in defensive concentration.

avg_insights: Strong possession-based playing style with 65% average ball control
Creative midfield with excellent passing accuracy (87% average)
Defensive transitions need improvement - vulnerable to counter-attacks
Set-piece defending requires attention and tactical adjustments
Physical play from opponents causes tactical challenges
priority_actions: Improve defensive transition speed and organization
Develop more direct attacking options for counter-attacking situations
Strengthen set-piece defending with specific training routines
Add physical presence in midfield for better balance
Maintain possession-based approach while adding tactical variety
